verses.roman:
tāṅre pradakṣiṇa kari' karila gamana
ethā ācāryera ghare uṭhila krandana

synonyms: tāṅre—mother Śacī; pradakṣiṇa kari'-circumambulating; karila—did; gamana—going; ethā—there; ācāryera—of Advaita Ācārya; ghare—in the house; uṭhila—there arose; krandana—crying.
translation: When everything was arranged, Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu circumambulated His mother and then started for Jagannātha Purī. In the house of Advaita Ācārya there arose tumultuous crying.
